entity.name: corp-conflicts
entity.query: SELECT id, name, state_type_cd, 'CORP' AS source FROM bc_registries.active_registry_vw

entity.name: name-conflicts
entity.query: SELECT nr_num AS id, name, name_state_type_cd AS state_type_cd, 'NR' AS source FROM bc_registries_names.completed_nro_vw WHERE name_state_type_cd IN ('A', 'C') AND consumption_date IS NULL AND request_type_cd NOT IN ('CEM', 'CFR', 'CLL', 'CLP', 'FR', 'LIB', 'LL', 'LP', 'NON', 'PAR', 'RLY', 'TMY', 'XCLL', 'XCLP', 'XLL', 'XLP') AND expiration_date >= NOW()
